welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hohhot, the vibrant capital of Inner Mongolia! Get ready to experience the unique blend of traditional Mongolian culture and modern city charm. We invite you to explore our beautiful landscapes, rich history, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!
